mapper.sql: SGUID, SKEY, SVALUE, SADDTIME, SADDER, SUPDATETIME, SUPDATER, ISDEL, SSX,SMS
mapper.select: select * from ps_shiro where isdel <>'1' order by SSX
mapper.insert: insert into ps_shiro (SGUID, SKEY, SVALUE, SADDTIME, SADDER, SUPDATETIME, SUPDATER, ISDEL, SSX,SMS) values (#{sguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sadder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ssx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sms,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update ps_shiro
SKEY = #{skey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVALUE = #{svalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SADDTIME = #{saddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SADDER = #{sadder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPDATETIME = #{supdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUPDATER = #{supdater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR},
SSX = #{ssx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SMS = #{sms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SGUID = #{sguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
